title: FS: 1888 Allen & Ginter John Morrell - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 Allen & Ginter John Morrell - SOLD
posts.post_content:
All forms of payment accepted. PM over post.

Available today is a very nice 1888 Allen & Ginter John Morrell. Front is beautiful, back has some paper which could probably be soaked off (not by me!). A very affordable example, just don't look at the back!

SOLD

Thanks for looking,
Tony
